alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 4:52AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Webb County through 530 AM CDT... At 451 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Unitec Industrial Park, or 13 miles northeast of Laredo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Texas A&M, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Unitec Industrial Park, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Orvil, Callaghan and Ranchos Penitas West. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 5 and 28. US Highway 59 between mile markers 796 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 692 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
